QGIS algorithm Universal kriging

Source: R/saga_universalkriging.R
saga_universalkriging.Rd

QGIS Algorithm provided by SAGA Universal kriging (saga:universalkriging)

saga_universalkriging(
  POINTS = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  FIELD = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  TQUALITY = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  LOG = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  BLOCK = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  DBLOCK = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  VAR_MAXDIST = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  VAR_NCLASSES = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  VAR_NSKIP = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  VAR_MODEL = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
 
    TARGET_USER_XMIN_TARGET_USER_XMAX_TARGET_USER_YMIN_TARGET_USER_YMAX = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  TARGET_USER_SIZE = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  TARGET_USER_FITS = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  PREDICTION = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  VARIANCE = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  SEARCH_RANGE = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  SEARCH_RADIUS = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  SEARCH_POINTS_ALL = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  SEARCH_POINTS_MIN = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  SEARCH_POINTS_MAX = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  SEARCH_DIRECTION = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  ...,
  .complete_output = TRUE
)

Arguments

POINTS

source - Points. Path to a vector layer.
FIELD

field - Attribute. The name of an existing field. ; delimited list of existing field names.
TQUALITY

enum of ("[0] standard deviation", "[1] variance") - Type of Quality Measure. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.
LOG

boolean - Logarithmic Transformation. 1 for true/yes. 0 for false/no.
BLOCK

boolean - Block Kriging. 1 for true/yes. 0 for false/no.
DBLOCK

number - Block Size. A numeric value.
VAR_MAXDIST

number - Maximum Distance. A numeric value.
VAR_NCLASSES

number - Lag Distance Classes. A numeric value.
VAR_NSKIP

number - Skip. A numeric value.
VAR_MODEL

string - Variogram Model. String value.
TARGET_USER_XMIN_TARGET_USER_XMAX_TARGET_USER_YMIN_TARGET_USER_YMAX

extent - Output extent. A comma delimited string of x min, x max, y min, y max. E.g. '4,10,101,105'. Path to a layer. The extent of the layer is used.. Original algorithm parameter name: TARGET_USER_XMIN TARGET_USER_XMAX TARGET_USER_YMIN TARGET_USER_YMAX.
TARGET_USER_SIZE

number - Cellsize. A numeric value.
TARGET_USER_FITS

enum of ("[0] nodes", "[1] cells") - Fit. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.
PREDICTION

rasterDestination - Prediction. Path for new raster layer.
VARIANCE

rasterDestination - Quality Measure. Path for new raster layer.
SEARCH_RANGE

enum of ("[0] local", "[1] global") - Search Range. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.
SEARCH_RADIUS

number - Maximum Search Distance. A numeric value.
SEARCH_POINTS_ALL

enum of ("[0] maximum number of nearest points", "[1] all points within search distance") - Number of Points. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.
SEARCH_POINTS_MIN

number - Minimum. A numeric value.
SEARCH_POINTS_MAX

number - Maximum. A numeric value.
SEARCH_DIRECTION

enum of ("[0] all directions", "[1] quadrants") - Search Direction. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.
...

further parameters passed to qgisprocess::qgis_run_algorithm()
.complete_output

logical specifing if complete out of qgisprocess::qgis_run_algorithm() should be used (TRUE) or first output (most likely the main) should read (FALSE). Default value is TRUE.

Details

Outputs description

  • PREDICTION - outputRaster - Prediction

  • VARIANCE - outputRaster - Quality Measure

Contents
